topics.body:
Idea: Take the genome of a Cuban crocodile. Edit the genes and their regulation so that it walks mostly on land while upright, give it regenerative abilities, alter the growth hormone promoter to make it as large as a saltwater crocodile, and alter the hormones to make it extremely aggressive. 

Voila, you now have a real-life version of SCP-682.
topics.author: 50b70eeb7f123b1a02000097

topics.body: Turns out my roommate wasn't the only dumbass at the party.  The person that ran this was his last semester at my college.  If he didn't run he would've just gotten a ticket; also he gave the police his ID card and told them where he lives before he ran.

I... How... Kuni, "if you don't mind":http://m.youtube.com/watch?v=qileP4bAzek

"@Background Pony #8E72":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/537af4536368725ce63d0400#post_537af4536368725ce63d0400
[bq="Background Pony #8E72"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/537af363636872108cd10000#post_537af363636872108cd10000

I... How... Kuni, "if you don't mind":http://m.youtube.com/watch?v=qileP4bAzek
[/bq]
Yeah; he kind of was stupid.

Options after you have given the cops your ID and told them where you live:
1)Pay the ticket and finish college.
2)Run from the cops, go to jail and get kicked out of college during your last semester.

I hope that guy never reproduces for the sake of the gene pool.

topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/537b0742636872344dfa0200#post_537b0742636872344dfa0200
I don't know, but he wasn't thinking it out well whatever his plan was.  What's funnier is that according to several of the people that were there he comically and in a cartoon manner sneaked past the officers' peripheral vision and escaped.  Too bad he didn't think to do that before he gave them his ID and address cause that would have been kind of funny.  What the dude should have done instead is when the cops came in and walked past the door snuck out right past them.  That would have been funny and smooth; but no he did that *AFTER* he gave them his ID card.  He snuck out and ran mission impossible style AFTER he gave them the ID and not when they first came in.


Also yes I did say persona; I like these kinds of franchises.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/537b0a0463687272066b0500#post_537b0a0463687272066b0500
Jesus Christ.

Why would you sneak away after giving them your ID!?

That's like killing a dog and still buying it dog food, Dude, Dogs dead!

And in this scenario, Dude, It's too late!

I've seen all of persona 4 thanks too a walkthrough by one of my favorite youtuber.

I gotta say, Gaame kicks ass!

I really hope he's realized how stupid he was.

topics.body:
Too much estrogen. I'm going to buy testosterone supplements.
Because if there's one thing I need it is to be more aggressive. 

In all seriousness testosterone does a lot more than increase aggression. According to my friends' recommendations, these supplements switch you on. Like you got over a hangover you never knew you had.
